eg.ui

Class EditArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ui.EditArea

  • public final class EditArea
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the editor view that contains the text area to edit text and the area that displays line numbers.

    The text area (JTextPane) is associated with a StyledDocument.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • EditArea

        public EditArea(boolean isWordWrap,
                boolean isLineNumbers,
                java.lang.String font,
                int fontSize)
        Parameters:
        isWordWrap - true to enable wordwrap
        isLineNumbers - true to show line numbering. Is effectless if isWordWrap is true
        font - the String name for the initial font
        fontSize - the size of the initial font

        Parameters:

        pos - the position where the text to color starts

      • showLineNumbers

        public void showLineNumbers()
        Shows line numbers.

      • hideLineNumbers

        Hides line numbers.

      • enableWordWrap

        public void enableWordWrap()
        Enables wordwrap.
